subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|玉|廾|ls=ic|t1=jade|t2=hands}} – play with a jade artefact using one's hands.

subSections.title: Etymology 1
subSections.text: Compared with {{cog|km|លួង||to console; to cheer; to coax; to flatter}} < {{cog|mkh-okm|lvaṅ||to cheer, amuse, entertain, divert}} < Pre-Angkorian Khmer ''loṅ''. The Khmer initial consonant does not agree with Old Chinese; perhaps the Khmer word is a post-[[Han]] loan ({{zh-ref|Schuessler, 2007}}).

subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[play]] with; to [[play around]] with; to [[fiddle]] with; to [[fondle]]
#: {{zh-x|真的 是 命運 弄 人。|It must be a quirk of fate.}}
# to [[enjoy]]; to [[play]]
# [[trick]]; [[magic]]
# to [[make]] [[fun]] of; to [[tease]]; to [[bully]]
# to [[show off]]; to [[make]] a [[show]] of
# {{lb|zh|Min Nan}} to [[amuse]] (a child)
# {{lb|zh|music}} to [[play]] (a musical instrument); to [[perform]]
# {{lb|zh|music}} [[ditty]]
# to [[do]]; to [[engage]] in; to [[undertake]]; to [[deal]] with
# to [[make]] ... [[do]]/[[become]] ...; to [[cause]] ... to [[do]] ...
#: {{zh-x|他 把 小孩 弄 哭 了。|He '''made''' the kid cry.}}
# {{lb|zh|colloquial}} to [[cause]] someone to [[become]] [[pregnant]]
# {{lb|zh|Min Nan}} to [[shake off]]; to [[shake]] out
# to [[marry]]
# to [[investigate]]; to [[look]] into
# to [[get]]; to [[obtain]]; to [[fetch]]
#: {{zh-x|你 這 書 哪兒{r} 弄 的 呀。|Where did you '''get''' the book?}}
# to [[decorate]]; to [[dress up]]; to put on [[make-up]]

subSections.title: Etymology 2
subSections.text: Possibly from an ancient regional variant of {{och-l|巷|alley}}.
